response:
Crossed pontine syndrome in a 43-year-old: vascular aetiology versus demyelination are most likely; structural haemorrhagic/mass lesions are next.

differential_diagnosis = ["Right pontine ischaemic stroke", "Relapsing\u2013remitting multiple sclerosis (right pontine plaque)", "Pontine cavernous malformation with recent haemorrhage", "Intrinsic pontine glioma", "Rhombencephalitis (e.g., Listeria)"]
